#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	int a[100002];
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int max1=INT_MIN;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			if(a[i]>max1)
			    max1=a[i];
		}
		cout<<max1<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
